content: the long legged cat is part of a series of stuffed animals including a bunny and a bear that are all made in the same style tall and skinny with long legs it is about 13 tall the legs body and head are worked in one pieces starting with the legs and working up the ears and arms are sewn on at the end this pattern is available free on the 5 little monsters website or available for purchase in the long legged animals ebook which includes 3 animals plus clothes and accessories for them to wear
